resources:
AtmosphericPressureCalculator Atmospheric Pressure Calculator Atmospheric Pressure is the force exerted on a surface by the air above it as gravity pulls it to Earth Calculate What force is exerted by the atmosphere over an area of _____m x _____m at _____ atmosphere? Enter Length Enter Width X In meters In meters Close Result.... Area Return Enter Atmosphere> 1 ATM ~ 10000 kg or 
 1 adult African Bush Elephant For Reference Elephant 2 ATM ~ 20,000 kg or 
 1 Adult Sei Whale seiwhale 3 ATM ~ 31000 kg or
